blog.name: argggghhhh
blog.title: theotherdirection
blog.description: I hate the one direction fandom. But love the entertainment. This is a blog where we talk about all the 1D drama. Here to point out the problematic behaviour of the fans and sometimes of the boys. The fans are just too involved in their personal lives, I was a directioner for a period of 2 months. These are not our opinions, some of them are, but mostly a collection of screenshots from the web. Come bite me. Oh, and btw we love Zayn.

summary: Okay so two things. BTS and other KPOP bands are rebound. Bwahahaha. Someone should teach them basic general knowledge. K-pop is...
caption: Okay so two things. BTS and other KPOP bands are rebound. Bwahahaha. Someone should teach them basic general knowledge. K-pop is from asia, with the two most populated countries. Let’s end it at that. Secondly about them just being cute and able to dance is great, because it certainly gives them an edge over a certain other band with members that were okay looking and couldn’t dance if their lives depended on it. So…..

blog.name: taybigailsweirdheart
blog.title: Step Into the Daylight and Let It Go
blog.description:
Lucie. 26. Bi. Brisbane. She/Her. 
Hello and welcome to my blog! This is pretty much my diary and scrapbook. Every thought in my head and emotion I feel you will see on this blog.
I believe that Taylor and Abigail's friendship is more beautiful then the stars on a cloudless night. 
I have a strong love for country music, young adult novels,British sitcoms,musical theatre, period dramas and coffee. I am a complete girly girl who loves fashion, shopping and make-up

Hello and welcome to STYLESLOOKBOOK! This blog is dedicated to clothing and accessories worn by Harry Styles.
Contact & inquiries: styleslookbook@gmail.com

summary: For his show in Dallas, Texas Harry wore a custom Alexander McQueen suit. The pink suit features a double-breasted jacket with...
caption:
For his show in Dallas, Texas Harry wore a custom Alexander McQueen suit. The pink suit features a double-breasted jacket with embroidered flowers down the front, and flared hem trousers. He paired the suit with black boots and a white shirt. Thank you to Harry Lambert for confirming this for us. Photos by tristxxx and paolaasebastian.

Custom Alexander McQueen suit

title: Production of HS merch tshirts?
body:
Can anyone tell me where exactly the shirts sold on Harry Styles’ merch shop are produced? 

I’m trying to figure out whether the shirts also come from fair and sustainable farming and production sites.

There’s no info on the website itself, maybe one of you knows more

title: Next To Me
body:
“Well is he okay?” you clutched the phone tighter, no longer able to conceal the anxiousness in your voice.

You were on the phone with Harry’s PA, B, and from what she’s told you so far, there’s been a situation with Harry while he’s on tour in Mexico.

“I think so,” she said, and like you, seemed a bit freaked out too. “the situation seems to be contained. I’m just waiting for someone to come back and sort out the stuff here with me then I’ll head over to see him.”

“Make sure someone’s with him at all time. I’ll give him a call in a bit.”

“Yeah I will,” B replied, “Honestly I didn’t know whether to call you or not and I really didn’t mean to disturb you or pry.”

“No, no. I’m glad you did. And call me anytime, okay? Doesn’t matter what, I’m here.”

“Thanks. And thanks for keeping me calm. I’ll get started here but you can try Harry on the iPhone. That’s the one he’s got with him right now.”

“Okay. Thanks B.”

You were frantically dialing his number as soon as B hanged up. You needed to hear his voice. That assurance that he was okay.

“Hello?” Y/N?” he sounded confused when he finally answered on the sixth ring.

“Harry. Hi. It’s me.”

“Hey.”

“I know we’re kind of in the middle of the no talking thing right now but B called and told me what happened. Are you okay?”

“Of course she did. I think she’s slightly freaked, poor thing. I just spoke with mum. B rung her too.”

“We’re all a bit worried, Harry.”

“Don’t worry about it. I’m fine. It’s fine. Under control.”

“Bullshit. You don’t have to pretend with me. You forget that I’ve seen this before. I know you’re scared, Harry. Anyone would be. And you don’t have to pretend you’re okay for me. I don’t care about that people pleasing shit. I care about you.”

He was silent for a while. It was just the way Harry responds when he’s struggling to admit even to himself that something was very wrong. Finally he spoke again.

“I don’t know if I can do this anymore.”

“Then cancel the show. Cancel the tour. None of this means anything if you’re miserable.”

“I can’t… you know I can’t.”

“They’ll understand. At least, the people who really love you will.”

“But I can’t do that. So many people will be disappointed. It’s going to be messy. Probably going to be worse than what’s happening now.”

“Of course you can. Harry, this is just work. I know work is your whole world, and I get that, but it’s still just a job. It’s costing you too much. It’s costing your soul and your wellbeing and you know how I feel about that.”

“I know, I know,” he sighed. This was a conversation you’ve had way too many times for your liking. And Harry being Harry, it took him a long time to even be open with you like this. He didn’t want to disappoint anyone and when you first got together, at the peak of him being the band, the pressure was too much that it all came crashing down on you at the most unexpected time.

“You know I just want what’s best for you,” your voice softened as you said it, “I always have. And the only reason why I say this is because I worry about you a lot. You look after everyone. Put everyone else first. Who’s looking after you? Who’s making sure you’re okay, really?”

“I’ll be okay. I’ll be fine. I mean, the situation’s been contained. I’ve calmed down a bit. I’m in my room and just taking it easy now…” Typical Harry to downplay something like this.

“Will you at least consider taking a longer break? And cancelling a show if you’re really not okay?”

“Yeah, okay, But honestly it will be okay. I’ve got nothing on from now and will just be resting. Where are you anyway?”

“We’re on holiday in some island.”

“We?”

“The girls and I.”

“Oh, right. Tell them I said hi.”

“I will. Are you sure you’re okay? Because I can take the next flight out and come see you.”

“Don’t be ridiculous. Enjoy your holiday! I’m fine. Besides, I’m not letting you fly halfway across the world just for me.”

“I would.”

“It’s not that I don’t wanna see you. I just don’t want you to miss out on, you know, life.”

“No more holding each other back, right?” you said. It was the note you ended on when you decided to spend some time apart and live your own lives for a while after Asia.

“No more holding each other back.”

“Did you at least bring ear plugs to drown out the noise? Have your candles with you? Tea?”

“Yeah, yeah,” he laughed, “you know I don’t go anywhere without those.”

“Good.”

“I’d love to see you, though,” he said suddenly, “I mean, after you’ve lived life and all…”

“When I’m old and nearing death?” you joked.

“Cheeky,” you could almost hear him smile over the phone, “but you know that’s not what I meant.”

“I’ll come meet you somewhere. Maybe LA.”

“You hate LA.”

“I don’t when you’re there.”

“Maybe we can go on another adventure when all this madness is over.”

You both knew that when it came to Harry and his life, the madness won’t ever be completely over. At least not for a very long time.

“Maybe. Maybe we can head back to Amangiri.”

“That was a lovely time, yeah.” He agreed.

“I’d love to come back.”

“Done.”

“I guess I better leave you to it,” you said, conscious that you’ve already taken up enough of Harry’s time and he probably wants to rest now but is just too polite to say anything.

“Oh alright,” he said, and you tried to ignore the voice in your head that detected just a hint of sadness when he said that, “Thank you for checking up on me. I really appreciate it.”

“I mean it, Harry. You’ve got to start putting yourself first. Without you, all this is nothing.”

“I will, thanks.”

“Take care, okay? Get some sleep. Relax if you can. Call me if you need anything. I’ve also told B to call me if you need anything at all.”

“You don’t have to do that.”

“I know, but I want to.”

“Thank you.”

“Look after yourself, okay? I’ll call you in the morning.”

“Thanks. Really.”

“Good night.”

“Sleeptight.”

“Sweet dreams.”

“Okay, I’ll let you go now. Enjoy the beach.”

“Bye!”

He slept soundly that evening, a combination of earplugs, a massage, and the specific oil blend designed to help him sleep doing the trick. And by the time morning rolled around, he was feeling much better.

He’s been too preoccupied with thoughts of you. Hearing your voice still had that effect on him, no matter how long it’s been or where he was in the world. You reminded him of the songs he wrote. The one he sings every night He remembered who this was all for and that that person was worth the world.

So when it was time for him to get up that stage and be Harry Styles again, he found it a little bit easier knowing that the songs he was singing had meaning. And that maybe you were out there thinking about him too.

-

A little Secret GF drabble, inspired by all your messages about how much you miss the series and my writing. I miss it too! Hope you enjoyed this little drabble xx

“Maybe. Maybe we can head back to Amangiri.”

“That was a lovely time, yeah.” He agreed.

“I’d love to come back.”

“Done.”

“I guess I better leave you to it,” you said, conscious that you’ve already taken up enough of Harry’s time and he probably wants to rest now but is just too polite to say anything.

“Oh alright,” he said, and you tried to ignore the voice in your head that detected just a hint of sadness when he said that, “Thank you for checking up on me. I really appreciate it.”

“I mean it, Harry. You’ve got to start putting yourself first. Without you, all this is nothing.”

“I will, thanks.”

“Take care, okay? Get some sleep. Relax if you can. Call me if you need anything. I’ve also told B to call me if you need anything at all.”

“You don’t have to do that.”

“I know, but I want to.”

“Thank you.”

“Look after yourself, okay? I’ll call you in the morning.”

“Thanks. Really.”

“Good night.”

“Sleeptight.”

“Sweet dreams.”

“Okay, I’ll let you go now. Enjoy the beach.”

“Bye!”

He slept soundly that evening, a combination of earplugs, a massage, and the specific oil blend designed to help him sleep doing the trick. And by the time morning rolled around, he was feeling much better.

He’s been too preoccupied with thoughts of you. Hearing your voice still had that effect on him, no matter how long it’s been or where he was in the world. You reminded him of the songs he wrote. The one he sings every night He remembered who this was all for and that that person was worth the world.

So when it was time for him to get up that stage and be Harry Styles again, he found it a little bit easier knowing that the songs he was singing had meaning. And that maybe you were out there thinking about him too.

-

A little Secret GF drabble, inspired by all your messages about how much you miss the series and my writing. I miss it too! Hope you enjoyed this little drabble xx

trail.content_raw:
“Well is he okay?” you clutched the phone tighter, no longer able to conceal the anxiousness in your voice.

You were on the phone with Harry’s PA, B, and from what she’s told you so far, there’s been a situation with Harry while he’s on tour in Mexico.

“I think so,” she said, and like you, seemed a bit freaked out too. “the situation seems to be contained. I’m just waiting for someone to come back and sort out the stuff here with me then I’ll head over to see him.”

“Make sure someone’s with him at all time. I’ll give him a call in a bit.”

“Yeah I will,” B replied, “Honestly I didn’t know whether to call you or not and I really didn’t mean to disturb you or pry.”

“No, no. I’m glad you did. And call me anytime, okay? Doesn’t matter what, I’m here.”

“Thanks. And thanks for keeping me calm. I’ll get started here but you can try Harry on the iPhone. That’s the one he’s got with him right now.”

“Okay. Thanks B.”

You were frantically dialing his number as soon as B hanged up. You needed to hear his voice. That assurance that he was okay.

“Hello?” Y/N?” he sounded confused when he finally answered on the sixth ring.

“Harry. Hi. It’s me.”

“Hey.”

“I know we’re kind of in the middle of the no talking thing right now but B called and told me what happened. Are you okay?”

“Of course she did. I think she’s slightly freaked, poor thing. I just spoke with mum. B rung her too.”

“We’re all a bit worried, Harry.”

“Don’t worry about it. I’m fine. It’s fine. Under control.”

“Bullshit. You don’t have to pretend with me. You forget that I’ve seen this before. I know you’re scared, Harry. Anyone would be. And you don’t have to pretend you’re okay for me. I don’t care about that people pleasing shit. I care about you.”

He was silent for a while. It was just the way Harry responds when he’s struggling to admit even to himself that something was very wrong. Finally he spoke again.

“I don’t know if I can do this anymore.”

“Then cancel the show. Cancel the tour. None of this means anything if you’re miserable.”

“I can’t… you know I can’t.”

“They’ll understand. At least, the people who really love you will.”

“But I can’t do that. So many people will be disappointed. It’s going to be messy. Probably going to be worse than what’s happening now.”

“Of course you can. Harry, this is just work. I know work is your whole world, and I get that, but it’s still just a job. It’s costing you too much. It’s costing your soul and your wellbeing and you know how I feel about that.”

“I know, I know,” he sighed. This was a conversation you’ve had way too many times for your liking. And Harry being Harry, it took him a long time to even be open with you like this. He didn’t want to disappoint anyone and when you first got together, at the peak of him being the band, the pressure was too much that it all came crashing down on you at the most unexpected time.

“You know I just want what’s best for you,” your voice softened as you said it, “I always have. And the only reason why I say this is because I worry about you a lot. You look after everyone. Put everyone else first. Who’s looking after you? Who’s making sure you’re okay, really?”

“I’ll be okay. I’ll be fine. I mean, the situation’s been contained. I’ve calmed down a bit. I’m in my room and just taking it easy now…” Typical Harry to downplay something like this.

“Will you at least consider taking a longer break? And cancelling a show if you’re really not okay?”

“Yeah, okay, But honestly it will be okay. I’ve got nothing on from now and will just be resting. Where are you anyway?”

“We’re on holiday in some island.”

“We?”

“The girls and I.”

“Oh, right. Tell them I said hi.”

“I will. Are you sure you’re okay? Because I can take the next flight out and come see you.”

“Don’t be ridiculous. Enjoy your holiday! I’m fine. Besides, I’m not letting you fly halfway across the world just for me.”

“I would.”

“It’s not that I don’t wanna see you. I just don’t want you to miss out on, you know, life.”

“No more holding each other back, right?” you said. It was the note you ended on when you decided to spend some time apart and live your own lives for a while after Asia.

“No more holding each other back.”

“Did you at least bring ear plugs to drown out the noise? Have your candles with you? Tea?”

“Yeah, yeah,” he laughed, “you know I don’t go anywhere without those.”

“Good.”

“I’d love to see you, though,” he said suddenly, “I mean, after you’ve lived life and all…”

“When I’m old and nearing death?” you joked.

“Cheeky,” you could almost hear him smile over the phone, “but you know that’s not what I meant.”

“I’ll come meet you somewhere. Maybe LA.”

“You hate LA.”

“I don’t when you’re there.”

“Maybe we can go on another adventure when all this madness is over.”

You both knew that when it came to Harry and his life, the madness won’t ever be completely over. At least not for a very long time.

“Maybe. Maybe we can head back to Amangiri.”

“That was a lovely time, yeah.” He agreed.

“I’d love to come back.”

“Done.”

“I guess I better leave you to it,” you said, conscious that you’ve already taken up enough of Harry’s time and he probably wants to rest now but is just too polite to say anything.

“Oh alright,” he said, and you tried to ignore the voice in your head that detected just a hint of sadness when he said that, “Thank you for checking up on me. I really appreciate it.”

“I mean it, Harry. You’ve got to start putting yourself first. Without you, all this is nothing.”

“I will, thanks.”

“Take care, okay? Get some sleep. Relax if you can. Call me if you need anything. I’ve also told B to call me if you need anything at all.”

“You don’t have to do that.”

“I know, but I want to.”

“Thank you.”

“Look after yourself, okay? I’ll call you in the morning.”

“Thanks. Really.”

“Good night.”

“Sleeptight.”

“Sweet dreams.”

“Okay, I’ll let you go now. Enjoy the beach.”

“Bye!”

He slept soundly that evening, a combination of earplugs, a massage, and the specific oil blend designed to help him sleep doing the trick. And by the time morning rolled around, he was feeling much better.

He’s been too preoccupied with thoughts of you. Hearing your voice still had that effect on him, no matter how long it’s been or where he was in the world. You reminded him of the songs he wrote. The one he sings every night He remembered who this was all for and that that person was worth the world.

So when it was time for him to get up that stage and be Harry Styles again, he found it a little bit easier knowing that the songs he was singing had meaning. And that maybe you were out there thinking about him too.

-

A little Secret GF drabble, inspired by all your messages about how much you miss the series and my writing. I miss it too! Hope you enjoyed this little drabble xx

blog.name: larryvicious
blog.title: Larry Vicious
blog.description:
Hello! This blog is dedicated to the beautiful legends Louis Tomlinson and Harry Styles.

Here you can find some pics, manips, gifs, videos, also NSFW manips.

I don’t care if Larry Stylinson it’s real or not, this is purely for eyes pleasure!

I don’t want hurt them, I love them both!

Have fun and don’t take too seriously ✌🏻
